Player History

Injured on 9/6/2015 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...

Traded from Baltimore to Cleveland on 7/7/2017 (Going to CLE: P J. Axford, CF C. Walker Jr.. Going to BAL: 3B L. Bell Jr.)...
